verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1919>earthly<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> of this <S%G4636>tabernacle<s%> were <S%G2647>dissolved,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3619>building<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> a <S%G3614>house<s%> not made with <S%G886>hands,<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>heavens.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G2532>we<s%> <S%G4727>groan,<s%> earnestly <S%G1971>desiring<s%> to be clothed <S%G1902>upon<s%> with <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3613>house<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1537>from<s%> heaven: <S%G3772><s%>
If so <S%G1489>be<s%> <S%G2532>that<s%> being <S%G1746>clothed<s%> we shall <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1131>naked.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532><s%> we that <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> this <S%G4636>tabernacle<s%> do <S%G4727>groan,<s%> being <S%G916>burdened:<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> for <S%G1909>that<s%> <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2309>would<s%> be <S%G1562>unclothed,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> clothed <S%G1902>upon,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2349>mortality<s%> might be swallowed <S%G2666>up<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> he that hath <S%G2716>wrought<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the selfsame <S%G846>thing<s%> <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2316>God,<s%> who also hath <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G728>earnest<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> we are <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2292>confident,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that,<s%> whilst we are at <S%G1736>home<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> we are <S%G1553>absent<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> We are <S%G2292>confident,<s%> I say, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2106>willing<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> to be <S%G1553>absent<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to be <S%G1736>present<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G2532>we<s%> <S%G5389>labor,<s%> that, <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G1736>present<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1553>absent,<s%> we may <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2101>accepted<s%> of <S%G846>him.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5319>appear<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> judgment <S%G968>seat<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> every <S%G1538>one<s%> may <S%G2865>receive<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> done <S%G1223>in<s%> his <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G4314>according<s%> to <S%G3739>that<s%> he hath <S%G4238>done,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> it be <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2556>bad.<s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5401>terror<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> we <S%G3982>persuade<s%> <S%G444>men;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> we are made <S%G5319>manifest<s%> unto <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> I <S%G1679>trust<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> are made <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4893>consciences.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G4921>commend<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> to <S%G2745>glory<s%> on our <S%G5228>behalf,<s%> <S%G2257><s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may <S%G2192>have<s%> somewhat <S%G4314>to<s%> answer them which <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4383>appearance,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in <S%G2588>heart.<s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> we be beside <S%G1839>ourselves,<s%> it is to <S%G2316>God:<s%> or <S%G1535>whether<s%> we be <S%G4993>sober,<s%> it is for your <S%G5213>cause.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4912>constraineth<s%> <S%G2248>us;<s%> because we <S%G5124>thus<s%> <S%G2919>judge,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> were all <S%G599>dead:<s%> <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> that he <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they which <S%G2198>live<s%> should not <S%G3371>henceforth<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> unto <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> unto him which <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> rose <S%G1453>again.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> <S%G575>henceforth<s%> <S%G3568><s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh:<s%> <S%G1161>yea,<s%> <S%G1499>though<s%> we have <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> henceforth <S%G1097>know<s%> we him no <S%G3765>more.<s%>

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> if any <S%G1536>man<s%> be <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> he is a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G2937>creature:<s%> old <S%G744>things<s%> are passed <S%G3928>away;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2537>new.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> who hath <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> to <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> hath <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%> of <S%G2643>reconciliation;<s%>

To <S%G5613>wit,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2644>reconciling<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> unto <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3049>imputing<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3900>trespasses<s%> unto <S%G846>them;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> hath <S%G5087>committed<s%> <S%G1722>unto<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2643>reconciliation.<s%>

Now <S%G3767>then<s%> we are <S%G4243>ambassadors<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> did <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2257>us;<s%> we <S%G1189>pray<s%> you in Christ's <S%G5228>stead,<s%> <S%G5547><s%> be ye <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he hath <S%G4160>made<s%> him to be <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> who <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G266>sin;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> might be <S%G1096>made<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>
